archimate:Device.name: Office Productivity AIO Desktop (OPD)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• General administrative offices (HR, Finance, Accounts, Procurement, Facilities, Business Office) • Routine tasks such as email, office software, document management, scheduling, data entry, and basic reporting.
Specifications:
• Processor type: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7 • Memory capacity: 16 GB RAM • Storage options: 512GB Minimum Graphics capability: Integrated graphics • Resolution: (QHD 2560x1440) for Large Displays Expansion slots and ports: USB-A (x4), USB-C (x1), HDMI output, SD card reader, audio jack, Ethernet • Connectivity: wi-fi 6 (ensure compatibility with network), Ethernet • Form factor: 27 inches screen, compact integrated chassis • Power supply rating: Built-in PSU, energy-efficient (minimum 90W). USB-C Power Delivery Support • Cooling system: Passive cooling or quiet fan-based cooling system • Operating system compatibility: Windows 11 Pro • Monitor specs: 27 inches, Full HD (1920x1080), IPS panel, anti-glare, height-adjustable stand • Protective Equipment: Privacy screen protector, robust desktop security cable • Included peripherals: Mouse and Keyboard • Docking Station Compatibility (USB-C / Thunderbolt) – Expands peripheral options for flexible work setups.
